testcase.name: 01 All four sections shown on the proteus home page
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns......................................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"...............................................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed And There is a box called "Campaigns".......................................passed And There is a box called "Reports".........................................passed And There is a box called "Client Reports"..................................passed And There is a box called "Administration"..................................passed And LogOut ProteusWeb from Home Page........................................passed

testcase.name: 02 Check if Reports tab opened correctly
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns......................................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"...............................................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed When I click on "Reports" from home page....................................passed Then Reports page shown correctly...........................................passed And LogOut ProteusWeb from Reports Page.....................................passed

testcase.name: 03 Check if Admin tab opened correctly
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns......................................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"...............................................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed When I click on "Administration" from home page.............................passed Then Administration page shown correctly....................................passed And Able to filter seats by Operation Unit TEL..............................passed And Able to navigate to Administration Jobs.................................passed And Able to navigate to Administration Master Data..........................passed And LogOut ProteusWeb from Admin Page.......................................passed

testcase.name: 04 Check if Client Reports tab opened correctly
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns......................................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login as "ADMINISTRATOR"...............................................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed When I click on "Client Reports" from home page.............................passed Then Client Reports page shown correctly....................................passed And Able to navigate to Client Reports Dashboard............................passed And Able to navigate to Client Reports Performance..........................passed And Able to navigate to Client Reports DSP..................................passed And Able to navigate to Client Reports Tactics..............................passed And LogOut ProteusWeb from Client Reports Page..............................passed
